reviews.review:
Ignore my playtime, I used to play on a cracked version bc I was poor, okay?

My second Counter-Strike game and by far my favourite. I've spent countless hours trying to master the art of Turbo GunGames, won like 20 times in all those years, but still my favourite memory of playing this game. The graphics and mechanics were a good upgrade from 1.6, while still keeping the core of the game intact and recognizable for old players. This is the true decessor of 1.6 (not counting CZ bc it sucks) and will always be one of my favourite games of all time. A big thumbs up from me because it is the best, yet most underrated CS game in my opinion.
its a old game but very very fun you should trty it if you havent already
作为热爱FPS游戏玩家的休闲养老不二之选。玩累了，可以在这里休息休息聊聊天，打娱乐。我就不信玩这游戏还能有开挂的。
its CS:S you already know what you are getting into, bhops are pretty easy too

Can’t believe I’ve never review this game. Absolutely fucking legendary besides 1.6. CS:CZ was a dope game but nothing like when the source engine launched in 2004. I have 1297 hours in this game and I don’t think I regret an hour of it. CS:GO is a pile of steaming shit compared to this game, and for a game that’s nearly 20 years old that speaks for itself. So many memories and amazing times and friends made via CS:S, if you have ever ran your own popular server you know what I’m talking about. Too bad it’s pretty much at an end. RIP CS:S you will never be forgotten.
me gusto el juego pero quiero que le pongan un competitivo para que cresca mas la comunidad de cs source
Je ne me tannerai jamais de jouer à ce jeu! J'adore et je recommande à n'importe qui! :)
brings back so many memories, i love to hop on this game every once in a while

One of the best FPS of all time
самые лутшие боты в серии кс
Bu oyun CS 1.6'nın eksiklerini kapatıyor ve çok iyi atmosfere sahip. Eğer eski bir 1.6 oyuncusu iseniz size öneriririm tam aradığınız oyun olabilir.
Это великолепно (вот бы Valve всегда такие игры делали) но это после CS 1.6... Ну думаю сами понимаете
Игра - клон стэндоффа, а потому, норм.
BİLGİSAYARI cs go kaldırmayanlar için mükemmelbir oyun

Ох. А вот это и правда настоящий последователь кс 1.6. Кс соурс. Да, разработчики улучшили графику. И она выглядит потрясающе! Для меня это первая КС в серии. Могу отметить что механика игры соответствует 1.6 версии. Я считаю эту игру как такой же шедевр - 1.6. Я не считаю её прорывом, но она и правда "усовременила" кс 1.6 на графику уровня движка Source. Также это не must-play, но игра расположилась в памяти надолго...

This game is like home to me, I started playing this as a kid with my dad and enjoyed it very much. It has allowed me connections tp pthers over years of time. It never gets old and it is always fun to see all the modded games once again (Surf, ZM, etc.)

One of the best video games of all time !!!

+ The graphic is good for an old game
- The texture in some map is bad, sometimes it makes the bot can't move/ stop moving (such as cs_militia and cs_office)
Not worth $20  got on sale, fun to play, hectic servers, good casual game compared to csgo

Я уже стар, и суставы мои болят... Но такой атмосферы я давно не испытывал. Эти самые сервера которые держат васяны, эти самые звук: свежий кабанчик, до взрыва осталось - и тд. Очень лампово, вспомнил молодость.
